title: Perfect Piña Margarita contains Don Julio Blanco Tequila and specific ingredients
statement: The Perfect Piña Margarita is made with Don Julio Blanco Tequila mixed with yuzu, fresh lime and pineapple juice, garnished with lime and pineapple slice.

citations.quote: Don Julio Blanco Tequila is mixed with yuzu, fresh lime and pineapple juice; finished with a fresh lime and pineapple slice
